Effect: Absorb Memories.name: Efekt: Absorb Memories
Effect: Absorb Memories.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to all skill checks.

Effect: Absorb Shock.name: Efekt: Absorpcja Wyładowania
Effect: Absorb Shock.description: Burzopij zyskuje 10 tymczasowych PŻ, jest przyspieszony oraz zwiększa wysięg swoich Ciosów pnączem o 5 stóp.

Effect: Activate Defenses.name: Efekt: Activate Defenses
Effect: Activate Defenses.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Adaptive Strike.name: Efekt: Adaptive Strike
Effect: Adaptive Strike.description: The creature's melee strikes count either as adamantine, cold iron or silver.

Effect: Aggravating Aura.name: Efekt: Aggravating Aura
Effect: Aggravating Aura.description: The creature gains weakness to all damage.

Effect: Air of Sickness.name: Efekt: Air of Sickness
Effect: Air of Sickness.description: The creature takes a –2 status penalty to saves made to resist diseases.

Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.name: Efekt: Kusza Alchemiczna
Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.description: The Alchemical Crossbow deals an additional 1k6 damage of the type dealt by the bomb used.

Effect: Alchemical Embalming.name: Efekt: Alchemical Embalming
Effect: Alchemical Embalming.description: You take a –10‐foot penalty to all your Speeds.

Effect: Alchemical Strike.name: Efekt: Alchemical Strike
Effect: Alchemical Strike.description:
Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. The drudge imbues its fist attacks with this damage.

Each hit deals 1k6 points of damage of the same type as that of the bomb loaded into it. Each bomb has enough fluid in it for 10 successful strikes.

Effect: Align the Stars.name: Efekt: Align the Stars
Effect: Align the Stars.description: If you are an ally, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. If you are an enemy, other creatures gain a +4 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against you.

Effect: Align the Stars (Ephemeral).name: Efekt: Align the Stars (Ephemeral)
Effect: Align the Stars (Ephemeral).description:
Ephemeral Effect

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: All Are One.name: Efekt: All Are One
Effect: All Are One.description: The area of bioluminescent maelstrom and the reach of their tentacle Strike increase by 10 feet, to a maximum of an additional 30 feet.

Effect: Ancestral Journey.name: Efekt: Ancestral Journey
Effect: Ancestral Journey.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and all skill checks.

Effect: Ancestral Response.name: Efekt: Ancestral Response
Effect: Ancestral Response.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.

Effect: Apprentice's Ambition.name: Efekt: Apprentice's Ambition
Effect: Apprentice's Ambition.description: The apprentice gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Artificer's Command.name: Efekt: Artificer's Command
Effect: Artificer's Command.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.

Effect: Asper's Elemental Aura.name: Efekt: Asper's Elemental Aura
Effect: Asper's Elemental Aura.description: You gain resistance 10 to damage of the chosen element (electricity for air, fire, or cold for water). If air, you double your speed. If fire, any creature within 30 feet of you who receives fire damage receives an extra 2k10 persistent fire damage. If water, you gain fast healing 20.

Effect: Assimilate Lava.name: Efekt: Assimilate Lava
Effect: Assimilate Lava.description: An obsidian golem that submerges itself in lava or magma takes no damage from it, and for as long as it remains submerged, it becomes slowed 2 and gains fast healing 15.

Effect: Aura of Command.name: Efekt: Aura of Command
Effect: Aura of Command.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Aura of Corruption.name: Efekt: Aura of Corruption
Effect: Aura of Corruption.description: The creature is treated as if it was a plant for the purposes of any effect that particularly harms or inconveniences plant creatures more than other creatures, but does not gain any benefits of being a plant creature.

Effect: Aura of Disquietude.name: Efekt: Aura of Disquietude
Effect: Aura of Disquietude.description: A creature frightened by the aura can't flank.

Effect: Aura of Good Cheer.name: Efekt: Aura of Good Cheer
Effect: Aura of Good Cheer.description: Allies within the aura gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects.

Effect: Aura of Growth.name: Efekt: Aura of Growth
Effect: Aura of Growth.description: Other plant creatures gain fast healing 20 while in the area.

Effect: Aura of Misfortune.name: Efekt: Aura of Misfortune
Effect: Aura of Misfortune.description: Living creatures must roll twice on all k20 rolls and use the lower result.

Effect: Aura of Protection (Solar).name: Efekt: Aura of Protection (Solar)
Effect: Aura of Protection (Solar).description: Allies in the solar's aura gain a +2 status bonus to AC against evil creatures and a +2 status bonus to saves against effects from evil creatures. The bonus increases to +4 against control by evil creatures and attacks by evil summoned creatures.

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: Efekt: Aura of Righteousness
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against unholy creatures and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls against unholy creatures.

Effect: Aura of Smoke.name: Efekt: Aura of Smoke
Effect: Aura of Smoke.description: Every creature within the aura is concealed.

Effect: Aura of Vitality.name: Efekt: Aura of Vitality
Effect: Aura of Vitality.description: Allies in the movanic deva's aura gain a +1 status bonus to all saving throws, resistance 10 to vitality and void damage, and are unharmed by the effects of a plane's vitality and void traits. Animals in the aura of 12. level or lower don't attack the movanic deva or the deva's allies unless they are controlled or otherwise forced to attack.

Effect: Avenge the Fallen.name: Efekt: Avenge the Fallen
Effect: Avenge the Fallen.description: You roll the attack roll twice and use the higher result.

Effect: Barbed Net.name: Efekt: Barbed Net
Effect: Barbed Net.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Bark Orders.name: Efekt: Bark Orders
Effect: Bark Orders.description: All kobold allies within 30 feet of him gain a +1 status bonus on attack rolls and saving throws against fear effects until the start of Chief Sootscale's next turn.

Effect: Bark Orders (Hold Sergeant).name: Efekt: Bark Orders (Hold Sergeant)
Effect: Bark Orders (Hold Sergeant).description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Bastion Aura.name: Efekt: Bastion Aura
Effect: Bastion Aura.description: All good-aligned creatures in the aura have fast healing 30 for as long as they remain in range, and they gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Battle Cry.name: Efekt: Battle Cry
Effect: Battle Cry.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Beacon of the Rowan Guard.name: Efekt: Beacon of the Rowan Guard
Effect: Beacon of the Rowan Guard.description: While within the emanation, a creature with the elemental trait and either the plant trait or wood trait gains fast healing 10 and a +2 circumstance bonus to all attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Beguiling Presence.name: Efekt: Beguiling Presence
Effect: Beguiling Presence.description: Creatures in the area that can observe the courtesan take a –2 status penalty on their Will DC against the courtesan's attempts to make a Request of them.

Effect: Belief Fortification.name: Efekt: Belief Fortification
Effect: Belief Fortification.description: Members of the garrholdion's faction gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects while within the aura.

Effect: Beseech the Spirits.name: Efekt: Beseech the Spirits
Effect: Beseech the Spirits.description: You gain lifesense 60 feet and all-around vision for 10 minutes.

Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.name: Efekt: Bittersweet Dreams
Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.description: The creature takes a status penalty to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks according to its save result.

Effect: Black Cat Curse.name: Efekt: Black Cat Curse
Effect: Black Cat Curse.description: Whenever you attempt an attack roll or saving throw, you must roll twice and use the lower result.

Effect: Blade Barrage.name: Efekt: Blade Barrage
Effect: Blade Barrage.description: They gain a cumulative +2 circumstance bonus to damage for each successful Strike.

Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.name: Efekt: Blasphemous Utterances
Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.description:
The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against mental effects.

It can't take actions that have the concentrate trait unless it succeeds at a @Check[flat|dc:10] check. Failing this check wastes the action.

1.text: A creature in the aura can't take actions that have the concentrate trait unless they succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:10] check. On a failure, the action is disrupted.

Effect: Blood Frenzy.name: Efekt: Blood Frenzy
Effect: Blood Frenzy.description: The creature gains temporary hit points and other effects based on the specific creature.

Effect: Blood Fury.name: Efekt: Blood Fury
Effect: Blood Fury.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Blood Magic
Effect: Blood Magic.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws.

Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Blood Siphon (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saves and is quickened. It can use its extra action only to Strike.

Effect: Blood Soak.name: Efekt: Blood Soak
Effect: Blood Soak.description: The creature gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Blood Wake.name: Efekt: Blood Wake
Effect: Blood Wake.description: The creature takes a –4 status penalty to Athletics checks to Swim.

Effect: Bloodline Magic.name: Efekt: Bloodline Magic
Effect: Bloodline Magic.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Deception checks.

Effect: Bloodline Magic (Stirvyn Banyan).name: Efekt: Bloodline Magic (Stirvyn Banyan)
Effect: Bloodline Magic (Stirvyn Banyan).description: When Stirvyn casts a bloodline spell, a surge of ancestral memories grants either him or a target of the spell a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

Effect: Bloom Regeneration.name: Efekt: Bloom Regeneration
Effect: Bloom Regeneration.description: For the next 4 rounds, the creature gains regeneration 10; this regeneration can be deactivated by cold iron or holy.

Effect: Bob.name: Efekt: Bob
Effect: Bob.description: The longlegs gains a +2 status bonus to its Armor Class.

Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.name: Efekt: Bodyguard's Defense
Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Bogwid Fever.name: Efekt: Bogwid Fever
Effect: Bogwid Fever.description: You are enfeebled, and the DC to recover from persistent bleed damage increases based on the stage of disease.

Effect: Bolster Torag's Chosen.name: Efekt: Bolster Torag's Chosen
Effect: Bolster Torag's Chosen.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and Will saves.

Effect: Bond in Light.name: Efekt: Bond in Light
Effect: Bond in Light.description: The creature glows with bright light in a 20-foot emanation and dim light to 40 feet and has fast healing 10.

Effect: Bosun's Command.name: Efekt: Bosun's Command
Effect: Bosun's Command.description: The creature gains the bosun's choice of a +2 status bonus to attack rolls or a +10 status bonus to its Speeds.

Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.name: Efekt: Brand of the Impenitent
Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to AC and saves, reduces its resistances by 2, and gains weakness 2 to holy.

Effect: Bravado Aversion.name: Efekt: Bravado Aversion
Effect: Bravado Aversion.description: A gargarthezul can't stand to be shown up. The first time each round a creature successfully Demoralizes, Shoves, or Trips a gargarthezul, it takes @Damage[1d6[mental]] damage.

Effect: Breach the Outer Rifts.name: Efekt: Breach the Outer Rifts
Effect: Breach the Outer Rifts.description: The weapon deals an extra 2k6 damage. Roll 1k20 to determine the type: 1–7 acid, 8–9 cold, 10–11 electricity, 12–18 fire, 19–20 void.

Effect: Break Legs!.name: Efekt: Break Legs!
Effect: Break Legs!.description: You become clumsy 1, take a –5‐foot penalty to your Speeds, and have weakness 5 to the origin's Strikes.

Effect: Brimstone Blessing.name: Efekt: Brimstone Blessing
Effect: Brimstone Blessing.description: The trident deals an extra 2k6 fire damage, gains the unholy trait, and gains the effects of a returning rune.

Effect: Brutal Rally.name: Efekt: Brutal Rally
Effect: Brutal Rally.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Bully the Departed.name: Efekt: Bully the Departed
Effect: Bully the Departed.description: The creature gains regeneration 15 (deactivated by force or good), and deals an extra @Damage[1d8[spirit]] damage on its Strikes.

Effect: Bully's Rage.name: Efekt: Bully's Rage
Effect: Bully's Rage.description: The bully gains a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and damage until the end of its turn.

Effect: Burned Fingers.name: Efekt: Burned Fingers
Effect: Burned Fingers.description: You take –1 circumstance penalty to Thievery checks.

Effect: Call to Action.name: Efekt: Call to Action
Effect: Call to Action.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Call to Blood.name: Efekt: Call to Blood
Effect: Call to Blood.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} creatures.

Effect: Call to Halt (Success).name: Efekt: Call to Halt (Sukces)
Effect: Call to Halt (Success).description: The target takes a –10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.name: Efekt: Calming Bioluminescence
Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Effect: Capture Magic.name: Efekt: Capture Magic
Effect: Capture Magic.description: The blade magus gains a +2 status bonus to damage from Arcane Cascade until the end of their next turn.

Effect: Cat Sith's Mark.name: Efekt: Cat Sith's Mark
Effect: Cat Sith's Mark.description: Whenever the cursed creature rolls a critical success on a skill check or saving throw, it gets a success instead. Each day, a cursed creature can attempt a @Check[flat|dc:10|traits:curse,misfortune|name:Break Cat Sith's Mark] check to break the curse.

Effect: Caustic Drool.name: Efekt: Caustic Drool
Effect: Caustic Drool.description: The abyssal warhound's jaws Strike deals an additional 2 points of acid damage on a successful attack, or 4 points on a critical success.

Effect: Caustic Mucus.name: Efekt: Żrąca Wydzielina
Effect: Caustic Mucus.description: Istota ponosi karę statusową –5 stóp do swoich Prędkości. Ta redukcja Prędkości kończy się wraz z przewlekłymi obrażeniami od kwasu.

Effect: Challenge Foe.name: Efekt: Challenge Foe
Effect: Challenge Foe.description: You gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to your number of weapon damage dice against your designated foe but take an equivalent circumstance penalty to damage against any other creature.

Effect: Champion's Aura (Champion of Rov.name: Efekt: Champion's Aura (Champion of Rovagug)
Effect: Champion's Aura (Champion of Rov.description: You take a –1 circumstance penalty to saves against fear.

Effect: Chant of Dominance.name: Efekt: Chant of Dominance
Effect: Chant of Dominance.description: Any creature damaged this turn also takes 1k6 persistent spirit damage.

Effect: Chaotic Spawning.name: Efekt: Chaotic Spawning
Effect: Chaotic Spawning.description: The vescavor swarm becomes Huge and quickened. It can only use the extra action each round for the Ravenous Bites action.

Effect: Chemical Fertilizer.name: Efekt: Chemical Fertilizer
Effect: Chemical Fertilizer.description: Gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speed until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Choose Weakness.name: Efekt: Choose Weakness
Effect: Choose Weakness.description:
The Ghaele changes the elemental damage dealt by its greatsword and light ray to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

It can also change its energy resistance to any of these energy types (this can be a different type than for its attacks).

Effect: Chug.name: Efekt: Chug
Effect: Chug.description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks, damage rolls, and saving throws against fear.

Effect: Circle of Horns.name: Efekt: Circle of Horns
Effect: Circle of Horns.description: The herd gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Cite Precedent.name: Efekt: Cite Precedent
Effect: Cite Precedent.description: The creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty on the next Diplomacy check in a legal argument.

Effect: Cloud of Allergens.name: Efekt: Cloud of Allergens
Effect: Cloud of Allergens.description: You take a –1 circumstance penalty to skill checks that have the concentration trait and all Perception checks while inside the cloud.

Effect: Commander's Aura.name: Efekt: Commander's Aura
Effect: Commander's Aura.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

Effect: Commanding Aura (Quara).name: Efekt: Commanding Aura (Quara)
Effect: Commanding Aura (Quara).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.JrowrtDilEG8dN2s]{Quara Orshendiel}

Drow around Quara are heartened by her presence. Her drow allies in the aura gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Commanding Shout.name: Efekt: Commanding Shout
Effect: Commanding Shout.description: The Gorumite infantry's save DCs for their Fire Crossbows! and Raise Swords! actions increase to DC 33 and they gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Compelled Performance.name: Efekt: Compelled Performance
Effect: Compelled Performance.description: The target has a +2 status bonus to Performance checks for one week.

Effect: Conduct.name: Efekt: Conduct
Effect: Conduct.description:
The concert frog and all allies within 60 feet gain one of the following three effects until the beginning of the concert frog's next turn.

  • Red Grants a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.
  • Blue Grants a +1 status bonus to AC and Fortitude saving throws.
  • Yellow Allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and deal an additional 1k4 sonic damage on successful melee Strikes.

Effect: Conduct the Experiment.name: Efekt: Conduct the Experiment
Effect: Conduct the Experiment.description: Your melee Strikes deal an extra 2k8 precision damage against the marked creature.

Effect: Conductive Downpour.name: Efekt: Conductive Downpour
Effect: Conductive Downpour.description: Creatures in the aura gain weakness 10 to electricity.

Effect: Construct Trap.name: Efekt: Construct Trap
Effect: Construct Trap.description: You take a –5 status penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Consume Flesh.name: Efekt: Consume Flesh
Effect: Consume Flesh.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to all skill checks.

Effect: Consume Memories.name: Efekt: Consume Memories
Effect: Consume Memories.description: Vordakai gains a +1 status bonus to all skill checks for 1 minute as a result of the consumed memories.

Effect: Consume Organ.name: Efekt: Consume Organ
Effect: Consume Organ.description: The creature gains 15 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Consume Soul.name: Efekt: Consume Soul
Effect: Consume Soul.description:
The obcisidaemon chooses one of the following effects.

Empower Spell The obcisidaemon gains a +2 status bonus to its spell DCs and spell attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Empower Weapon The obcisidaemon's weapon gains the effects of a greater flaming, greater frost, greater shock, or wounding rune until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Consumed by Bloodlust.name: Efekt: Consumed by Bloodlust
Effect: Consumed by Bloodlust.description: Blackfingers gains a +2 status bonus to attacks and damage with his dagger, but is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2}.

Effect: Countered by Fire.name: Efekt: Countered by Fire
Effect: Countered by Fire.description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and AC, and its jaws Strike doesn't deal electricity damage.

Effect: Countered by Water.name: Efekt: Countered by Water
Effect: Countered by Water.description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, and its jaws Strike doesn't deal fire damage.

Effect: Create Opening.name: Efekt: Create Opening
Effect: Create Opening.description: You take a –2 status penalty to AC against the next Strike made against you.

Effect: Crocodile Form.name: Efekt: Crocodile Form
Effect: Crocodile Form.description: The bunyip gains a land Speed of 20 feet, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.

Effect: Crush Chitin.name: Efekt: Crush Chitin
Effect: Crush Chitin.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to AC.

Effect: Crush of Hundreds.name: Efekt: Crush of Hundreds
Effect: Crush of Hundreds.description: The creature takes a –10-foot penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Crushing Spirits.name: Efekt: Crushing Spirits
Effect: Crushing Spirits.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all its Speeds.

Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.name: Efekt: Crystalline Dust Form
Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.description: The creature gains a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Curl Up.name: Efekt: Curl Up
Effect: Curl Up.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Curse Trespassers.name: Efekt: Curse Trespassers
Effect: Curse Trespassers.description: You take a –2 penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Curse of Boiling Blood.name: Efekt: Curse of Boiling Blood
Effect: Curse of Boiling Blood.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 20 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} at all times.

Effect: Curse of Stone.name: Efekt: Curse of Stone
Effect: Curse of Stone.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to its AC.

Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.name: Efekt: Curse of the Baneful Venom
Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.description: The creature immediately attempts its next saving throw against a poison with a –2 status penalty.

Effect: Darivan's Bloodline Magic.name: Efekt: Darivan's Bloodline Magic
Effect: Darivan's Bloodline Magic.description: When Darivan's bloodline magic activates, his movements become supernaturally graceful and distracting, granting him a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round or imposing a –1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Death Gasp.name: Efekt: Death Gasp
Effect: Death Gasp.description: The creature gains the undead trait and becomes immune to bleed, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, and sleep.

Effect: Death Gasp (Etioling).name: Efekt: Death Gasp (Etioling)
Effect: Death Gasp (Etioling).description: The creature gains the undead and incorporeal traits, a fly Speed of 25 feet, resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or vitality; double this resistance vs. non-magical) and becomes immune to bleed, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, and sleep.

Effect: Deceitful Feast (Failure).name: Efekt: Deceitful Feast (Porażka)
Effect: Deceitful Feast (Failure).description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to Will saves against any of the brughadatch's spells or abilities. The penalty increases with each failed save, to a maximum of –5.

Effect: Deceptive Heads.name: Efekt: Deceptive Heads
Effect: Deceptive Heads.description: The number of deceptive heads the tyrafdir currently has.

Effect: Defensive Assault.name: Efekt: Defensive Assault
Effect: Defensive Assault.description: The creature gains a circumstance bonus to AC based on the weapons used for defense.

Effect: Defensive Slam.name: Efekt: Defensive Slam
Effect: Defensive Slam.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Defensive Slice.name: Efekt: Defensive Slice
Effect: Defensive Slice.description: Baron Drelev assumes a defensive position with his weapons out, then attempts a melee Strike. He takes a –2 status penalty on all Strikes (including this one) and gains a +2 status bonus to his AC until the start of his next turn.

Effect: Demon-Touched Weapon.name: Efekt: Demon-Touched Weapon
Effect: Demon-Touched Weapon.description: Shenga deals an additional 1k6 bleed damage with her melee Strikes.

Effect: Deny Fate.name: Efekt: Deny Fate
Effect: Deny Fate.description: When you roll initiative, you automatically roll a 1.

Effect: Dero Medicine.name: Efekt: Dero Medicine
Effect: Dero Medicine.description: The target has slashing weakness 2 for 1 hour and is immune to further uses of Dero Medicine.

Effect: Despair.name: Efekt: Despair
Effect: Despair.description: Living creatures are frightened 1 while in a despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave the area.

Effect: Despoiler.name: Efekt: Despoiler
Effect: Despoiler.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to all saving throws against poisons, diseases, and drugs.

Effect: Destructive Vengeance.name: Efekt: Destructive Vengeance
Effect: Destructive Vengeance.description: The champion deals 2 extra spirit or void damage with their Strikes against the triggering creature.

Effect: Devil's Cursed Breath.name: Efekt: Devil's Cursed Breath
Effect: Devil's Cursed Breath.description: The cursed creature takes a –2 status penalty to all attacks.

Effect: Devour Soul.name: Efekt: Devour Soul
Effect: Devour Soul.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.name: Efekt: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or Higher)
Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Diplomatic Immunity.name: Efekt: Diplomatic Immunity
Effect: Diplomatic Immunity.description: The attacker gains weakness 2 to all damage from the envoy's allies while Diplomatic Immunity lasts, whether their attack was disrupted or not.

Effect: Dire Warning.name: Efekt: Dire Warning
Effect: Dire Warning.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Dirty Bomb.name: Efekt: Dirty Bomb
Effect: Dirty Bomb.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.

Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Dirty Bomb (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).description: The creature takes a –3 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.

Effect: Discerning Aura.name: Efekt: Discerning Aura
Effect: Discerning Aura.description: All undead within the aura glow blue, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius.

Effect: Distracting Frolic.name: Efekt: Distracting Frolic
Effect: Distracting Frolic.description: The target ally can roll the save twice and take the better result.

Effect: Distracting Giggle.name: Efekt: Distracting Giggle
Effect: Distracting Giggle.description: Creatures take a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Disturbing Vision.name: Efekt: Disturbing Vision
Effect: Disturbing Vision.description: The visions last [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}, and while they do, all evil creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to all checks.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Efekt: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects and a –1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Frenzy.name: Efekt: Divine Frenzy
Effect: Divine Frenzy.description: You take a –2 penalty to Perception checks and Will saves and gain a +2 status bonus to your spell DC and spell attack modifier. You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless you're Casting a Spell or Seeking.

Effect: Divine Weapon.name: Efekt: Divine Weapon
Effect: Divine Weapon.description: Sister Maeri's sawtooth saber deals an additional 1k4 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chelaxian Cleric).name: Efekt: Divine Weapon (Chelaxian Cleric)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chelaxian Cleric).description: The Chelaxian cleric's Strikes gain the unholy trait and deal an additional 1k4 spirit damage; this damage increases to 2k4 against creatures with the holy trait.

Effect: Don Mask.name: Efekt: Don Mask
Effect: Don Mask.description:
The mummer gains a primal boon:

  • Fiery Akkarok The mummer's melee Strikes deal an additional 2k6 fire damage.
  • Hazi Zephyr-Borne The mummer gains a fly Speed of 20 feet.
  • King of Storms The mummer gains the Reactive Strike reaction that can be used only with their tail.
  • Nessek, the Wave Dancer The mummer's claw Strikes deal an additional 2k4 persistent bleed damage.
  • Zalok, Who was Called to Black Harbor The mummer gains a +10-foot status bonus to their land Speed and swim Speed.

Effect: Downcast.name: Efekt: Downcast
Effect: Downcast.description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls

Effect: Draconic Breath Weapon Aura.name: Efekt: Draconic Breath Weapon Aura
Effect: Draconic Breath Weapon Aura.description: After the dragon uses its Breath Weapon, an aura surrounds its body for 1 round.

Effect: Drain Life.name: Efekt: Drain Life
Effect: Drain Life.description: The wight spell sniper gains 2k6 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Drain Luck.name: Efekt: Drain Luck
Effect: Drain Luck.description: The creature gains a status penalty to all checks.

Effect: Drain Luck (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Drain Luck (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Drain Luck (Critical Failure).description:
Granted by Drain Luck.

You must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.

Effect: Drain Luck (Failure).name: Efekt: Drain Luck (Porażka)
Effect: Drain Luck (Failure).description:
Granted by Drain Luck.

You must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.

Effect: Drain Luck (Success).name: Efekt: Drain Luck (Sukces)
Effect: Drain Luck (Success).description:
Granted by Drain Luck.

You must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.

Effect: Drain Vigor.name: Efekt: Drain Vigor
Effect: Drain Vigor.description: The umbral dragon gains 20 temporary hit points.

Effect: Drink Emotions.name: Efekt: Drink Emotions
Effect: Drink Emotions.description: While excited, the unfeeling empath takes a –1 penalty to AC, gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and deals an additional 1k4 mental damage with its melee Strikes.

Effect: Droning Wings.name: Efekt: Droning Wings
Effect: Droning Wings.description: The coloxus gains immunity to sonic damage.

Effect: Dueling Dance.name: Efekt: Dueling Dance
Effect: Dueling Dance.description: Vorens gains a +2 circumstance bonus to his AC until the start of his next turn.

Effect: Ectoplasmic Form (Physical).name: Efekt: Ectoplasmic Form (Physical)
Effect: Ectoplasmic Form (Physical).description: The creature loses the incorporeal trait, the immunity to precision damage and all resistances. It gains temporary hit points and an increased armor class according to the specific creature, its jaws strikes deal piercing and its claws strikes deal slashing damage instead of negative.

Effect: Electric Surge.name: Efekt: Electric Surge
Effect: Electric Surge.description: The shambler gains 12 temporary HP and is quickened.

Effect: Electricity Absorption.name: Efekt: Electricity Absorption
Effect: Electricity Absorption.description: After taking electricity damage, a shock zombie loses its usual slowed 1 condition, gains the ability to use reactions, and gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Speed.

Effect: Energy Ward.name: Efekt: Energy Ward
Effect: Energy Ward.description: The cascader gains resistance 15 to the triggering damage, replacing any other resistance gained from this ability. The cascader's melee strikes also deal an additional 4k10 damage of this type.

Effect: Engulf and Swallow Whole.name: Efekt: Pochłonięcie i Połknięcie w Całości
Effect: Engulf and Swallow Whole.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]{Pochłonięcie} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Połknięcie w Całości}

Jesteś pochwycony, spowolniony 1 oraz musisz wstrzymać oddech albo zaczniesz się dusić. Możesz atakować źródło efektu jedynie atakami wręcz lub bronią o Naręczu lekkim lub mniejszym, a źródło efektu ma przeciw temu atakowi @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczoną Gardę}. Jeśli źródło efektu otrzyma od pojedynczego ataku lub zaklęcia obrażenia kłute lub cięte równe lub większe od wymienionej wartości Rozdarcia, wycinasz sobie drogę na zewnątrz.

Effect: Enraging Whistle.name: Efekt: Enraging Whistle
Effect: Enraging Whistle.description: Animals gain a +1 status bonus to attacks and damage.

Effect: Ensnare.name: Efekt: Ensnare
Effect: Ensnare.description: The creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed.

Effect: Entangling Slime.name: Efekt: Entangling Slime
Effect: Entangling Slime.description: The creature becomes clumsy 1 and takes a –5-foot penalty to Speed.

Effect: Entangling Train.name: Efekt: Entangling Train
Effect: Entangling Train.description: The creature takes a –15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Exalt the Little Ones.name: Efekt: Exalt the Little Ones
Effect: Exalt the Little Ones.description: Creatures with the animal trait gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws. If the animals have the swarm trait, the saving throw DCs to resist their damaging actions gain a +1 status bonus. This bonus increases to +2 for allies whose level is 2 or lower.

Effect: Exalted Retributive Strike.name: Efekt: Exalted Retributive Strike
Effect: Exalted Retributive Strike.description: You gain resistance 14 to all damage against the triggering damage.

Effect: Fan Bolt.name: Efekt: Fan Bolt
Effect: Fan Bolt.description: The creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to its swim Speed.

Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.name: Efekt: Fanatical Frenzy
Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and takes a –2 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Fed by Metal.name: Efekt: Fed by Metal
Effect: Fed by Metal.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to AC.

Effect: Fed by Wood.name: Efekt: Fed by Wood
Effect: Fed by Wood.description: The fire damage from the creature's jaws increases by one die.

Effect: Feed.name: Efekt: Feed
Effect: Feed.description: The creature gains a status bonus to its checks and DCs depending on how often it used the Feed ability.

Effect: Fetid Fumes.name: Efekt: Fetid Fumes
Effect: Fetid Fumes.description: Everything within the aura is concealed by smoke.

Effect: Fetid Screech (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Fetid Screech (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Fetid Screech (Critical Failure).description: The creature takes a –5 foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Fettering Fedora.name: Efekt: Fettering Fedora
Effect: Fettering Fedora.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds.

Effect: Fiddle.name: Efekt: Fiddle
Effect: Fiddle.description:
A catchy fiddling tune compels the creature to dance about.

Porażka Off-guard and –10-foot status penalty to Speeds

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and also slowed 1

Effect: Field of Past Regrets.name: Efekt: Field of Past Regrets
Effect: Field of Past Regrets.description: PCs gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects. Living, non-nindoru creatures gain weakness 3 to mental damage.

Effect: Field of Slaughter (Bleed).name: Efekt: Field of Slaughter (Bleed)
Effect: Field of Slaughter (Bleed).description: Critical hits within the aura deal 3k6 persistent bleed damage.

Effect: Field of Slaughter (Keen).name: Efekt: Field of Slaughter (Keen)
Effect: Field of Slaughter (Keen).description: Your weapons and unarmed strikes gain the keen rune.

Effect: Field of Undeath.name: Efekt: Field of Undeath
Effect: Field of Undeath.description: Allies within the aura who have void healing gain fast healing.

Effect: Fiery Form.name: Efekt: Fiery Form
Effect: Fiery Form.description: The blood hag gains the fire trait and a fly Speed of 60 feet, becomes immune to fire, and emits light as a torch.

Effect: Fiery Rhetoric.name: Efekt: Fiery Rhetoric
Effect: Fiery Rhetoric.description: You take a –2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves.

Effect: Filth Wave.name: Efekt: Filth Wave
Effect: Filth Wave.description: You take a penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Flammable.name: Efekt: Flammable
Effect: Flammable.description: While burning, a bakeneko's Strikes inflict an additional 1k6 fire damage.

Effect: Flesh Mutation.name: Efekt: Flesh Mutation
Effect: Flesh Mutation.description:
You are affected by an effect according to the result.

1 Spongy Flesh The creature has weakness 5 to physical damage.

2 Caustic Blood The creature takes @Damage[2d4[persistent,acid]] damage that can't be removed normally, but ends when the mutation does.

3 Sprouting Eyes The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony}, but also immune to flanking.

4 Mutated Mind The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany}. It can still recover as noted in the condition, but if it does it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} until the mutation ends.

Effect: Focused Assault.name: Efekt: Focused Assault
Effect: Focused Assault.description: The creature deals additional damage based on the amount of longswords it wields.

Effect: Fold Form.name: Efekt: Fold Form
Effect: Fold Form.description: The kinzaruk swiftly unfolds and refolds its body into a new shape chosen from the options of animal form. This grants it the movement Speeds and Strikes of the chosen form, but none of the other benefits. Its attack bonus is unchanged, and its damage bonus is +3.

Effect: Follow Me.name: Efekt: Follow Me
Effect: Follow Me.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception and Stealth checks.

Effect: Forgiven Defaced Naiad Queen's T.name: Efekt: Forgiven Defaced Naiad Queen's Thanks
Effect: Forgiven Defaced Naiad Queen's T.description: You gain a +3 status bonus to Lore checks and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Form a Phalanx.name: Efekt: Form a Phalanx
Effect: Form a Phalanx.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Fortune's Favor.name: Efekt: Fortune's Favor
Effect: Fortune's Favor.description: Whenever the creature attempts a specific type of saving throw, it rolls twice and takes the higher result. The type of saving throw is determined by the suit that featured most prominently in the harrow reading: Fortitude (Hammers or Shields), Reflex (Keys or Books), or Will (Stars or Crowns)

Effect: Fox's Wager.name: Efekt: Fox's Wager
Effect: Fox's Wager.description: The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +5 status bonus to damage against constructs, objects, and structures constructed by humanoids. It also gains a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks against humanoids.

Effect: Funereal Dirge.name: Efekt: Funereal Dirge
Effect: Funereal Dirge.description: The creature takes a –2 status penalty to saving throws against drain life.

Effect: Furious Possession.name: Efekt: Furious Possession
Effect: Furious Possession.description:
The creature gains 12 temporary Hit Points that are lost when the possession ends. During the possession, the creature has the pulse of rage aura. Each time the possessed creature makes a melee Strike, the spirit can substitute their ephemeral claw attack modifier, damage amount, or both in place of the creature's own statistics.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.GC5441z8i7N8swk1]{Efekt: Pulse of Rage}

Effect: Ganzi Resistance.name: Efekt: Ganzi Resistance
Effect: Ganzi Resistance.description: The creature gains an amount of resistance to acid, electricity, or sonic (chosen randomly each day) based on the specific creature.

Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.name: Efekt: Ghonhatine Feed
Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.description: The creature gains fast healing 5 and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Gift of Hospitality.name: Efekt: Gift of Hospitality
Effect: Gift of Hospitality.description:
The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Society and Diplomacy checks.

The gift ends if the target acts hostile, or if the faydhaan renounces the recipient.

Effect: Gird in Prayer.name: Efekt: Gird in Prayer
Effect: Gird in Prayer.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death, mental, and possession effects.

Effect: Gleaming Armor.name: Efekt: Gleaming Armor
Effect: Gleaming Armor.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance to energy damage based on the specific creature.

Effect: Gloom Aura.name: Efekt: Gloom Aura
Effect: Gloom Aura.description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws made to resist emotion effects.

Effect: Glowing Spores.name: Efekt: Glowing Spores
Effect: Glowing Spores.description: The creature takes a –4 penalty to Stealth checks.

Effect: Glutton's Feast.name: Efekt: Glutton's Feast
Effect: Glutton's Feast.description: The ogre glutton gains 1k4 temporary hit points, or 2k4 following glutton's rush.

Effect: Goblin Song.name: Efekt: Goblin Song
Effect: Goblin Song.description: Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: Grab Debris.name: Efekt: Grab Debris
Effect: Grab Debris.description:
The scroungefeather gains access to the listed abilities until it uses Tossed Scraps to discard the debris or until it Releases the debris. The scroungefeather can't use its beak attack while it is using its beak to Grab Debris.

  1. Armor scrap The scroungefeather gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC.

  2. Shattered blade The scroungefeather gains a broken blade melee Strike with a +12 attack modifier that deals 2k10+6 slashing damage.

  3. Unexploded bomb When the scroungefeather throws this with Tossed Scraps, all the damage is fire damage, and the bomb also deals 3 fire splash damage.

  4. Faulty wand The scroungefeather gains a magic bolt ranged Strike with a +14 attack modifier that deals 2k6+6 force damage.

Effect: Grasp of the Deep.name: Efekt: Grasp of the Deep
Effect: Grasp of the Deep.description: The creature gains cold weakness 10 and take a –2 status penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Grasping Tendrils.name: Efekt: Chwytne Pnącza
Effect: Grasping Tendrils.description: Akata zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +2 do rzutów ataku w obszarze jej chwytnych pnączy.

Effect: Guard's Parry (Guard).name: Efekt: Guard's Parry (Guard)
Effect: Guard's Parry (Guard).description: The palace guard gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls until the end of their next turn.

Effect: Guard's Parry (Liege).name: Efekt: Guard's Parry (Liege)
Effect: Guard's Parry (Liege).description: The liege gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guardian's Aegis.name: Efekt: Guardian's Aegis
Effect: Guardian's Aegis.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to saves against magical effects. The bonus increases to +2 if the effect originated from a demon or other chaotic evil fiend.

Effect: Guide's Warning.name: Efekt: Guide's Warning
Effect: Guide's Warning.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative rolls. This bonus increases to +2 if the guide was Scouting.

Effect: Guiding Words.name: Efekt: Guiding Words
Effect: Guiding Words.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against the marked creature.

Effect: Guiding Words (Guide).name: Efekt: Guiding Words (Guide)
Effect: Guiding Words (Guide).description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the marked creature.

Effect: Guildmaster's Lead.name: Efekt: Guildmaster's Lead
Effect: Guildmaster's Lead.description: The member of the Copper Hand deals an additional 1k6 precision damage the first time they deal damage.

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.name: Efekt: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.description: The creature takes a –4 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).name: Efekt: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Porażka)
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).description: The creature takes a –2 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Hamstring.name: Efekt: Hamstring
Effect: Hamstring.description: The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).name: Efekt: Harmonizing Aura (Allies)
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a +1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).name: Efekt: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies)
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).description: The creature gains a –2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a –1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects

Effect: Harness Wickedness.name: Efekt: Harness Wickedness
Effect: Harness Wickedness.description: Your Strikes deal an additional die of damage and gain the unholy trait. You also gains 10 temporary Hit Points, a +5-foot status bonus to Speed, and weakness 5 to holy.

Effect: Harrow Burst.name: Efekt: Harrow Burst
Effect: Harrow Burst.description: A creature that fails its save rolls 1k6 to determine a suit of cards: 1 = hammers (Strength), 2 = keys (Dexterity), 3 = shields (Constitution), 4 = books (Intelligence), 5 = stars (Wisdom), 6 = crowns (Charisma). The creature takes a –1 status penalty to all checks related to that ability score for 1 round (–2 status penalty on a critical failure)

Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.name: Efekt: Harrowing Misfortune
Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.description: The creature must roll twice and take the lower result on its next roll of a specific type, determined by the card's suit. The suits and their effects are: Hammers (melee attack roll), Keys (Reflex save), Shields (Fortitude save), Books (skill check), Stars (Will save), and Crowns (spell attack roll).

Effect: Haywire.name: Efekt: Haywire
Effect: Haywire.description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to Strikes but deals an additional @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

Effect: Heart Break.name: Efekt: Heart Break
Effect: Heart Break.description: Until the end of her next turn, each enemy within 60 feet of Narcela takes a –1 item penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Hope Vulnerability.name: Efekt: Hope Vulnerability
Effect: Hope Vulnerability.description: The first time each round that a creature critically fails at an attack or skill check against the elegecide, it experiences a burst of hope that leaves it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Effect: Howl of Vengeful Fury.name: Efekt: Howl of Vengeful Fury
Effect: Howl of Vengeful Fury.description: Thatchlings gain 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to their Strikes and saving throws.

Effect: Hunt Will.name: Efekt: Hunt Will
Effect: Hunt Will.description: The steed gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek the prey and to Survival checks to Track the prey. The first time the steed hits its designated prey in a round, it deals an additional 1k8 precision damage.

Effect: Hunted Fear.name: Efekt: Hunted Fear
Effect: Hunted Fear.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Survival checks to avoid getting lost.

Effect: Hunter's Onslaught.name: Efekt: Hunter's Onslaught
Effect: Hunter's Onslaught.description: You become fascinated by the marked creature and you gain 10 temporary Hit Points that last as long as the onslaught does. You gain a +8 status bonus to damage rolls against the marked enemy, and allies in a 30-foot aura around the hunter gain half that bonus.

Effect: Hurl Net.name: Efekt: Hurl Net
Effect: Hurl Net.description: On a hit, you are off-guard and take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds. On a critical hit, you are restrained instead.

Effect: Hurtful Critique.name: Efekt: Hurtful Critique
Effect: Hurtful Critique.description: The creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (-2 on a critical failure).

Effect: Hydra Heads.name: Efekt: Hydra Heads
Effect: Hydra Heads.description: The number of heads the hydra currently has.

Effect: Hypnotic Stare.name: Efekt: Hypnotic Stare
Effect: Hypnotic Stare.description: That target takes a –2 penalty to Will saving throws.

Effect: Ill Omen.name: Efekt: Zły Omen
Effect: Ill Omen.description: The creature takes a –1 penalty to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws while within the ill omen aura and becomes immune to fortune effects for 1 day.

Effect: Imbue Righteousness.name: Efekt: Imbue Righteousness
Effect: Imbue Righteousness.description: Your strikes with that weapon gain the holy trait and deal an additional 1k6 spirit damage to unholy creatures.

Effect: Impaling Chain.name: Efekt: Impaling Chain
Effect: Impaling Chain.description: The target is impaled and anchored in place, becoming grabbed by the chain. The creature is unable to recover from persistent bleed damage until it gets free.

Effect: Impersonated Ability.name: Efekt: Impersonated Ability
Effect: Impersonated Ability.description: The Noppera-Bo Impersonator selects from their impersonated abilities.

Effect: Incendiary Dollop.name: Efekt: Incendiary Dollop
Effect: Incendiary Dollop.description: For the following 1 minute, or until a creature scrubs away the grease dollop with a single Interact action, the DC of the creature's checks to recover from persistent fire damage is increased by 2.

Effect: Infectious Aura.name: Efekt: Infectious Aura
Effect: Infectious Aura.description:
The creature takes a –2 status penalty to saves against disease effects.

If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

Effect: Infernal Wound.name: Efekt: Piekielna Rana
Effect: Infernal Wound.description: Test płaski na zatrzymanie krwawienia zaczyna się od ST 20. ST jest zmniejszany do 15 tylko jeśli krwawiąca istota lub jej sojusznik pomyślnie wesprą ozdrowienie

Effect: Inspirational Presence.name: Efekt: Inspirational Presence
Effect: Inspirational Presence.description: Any of the teacher's students in the aura gains a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Pozyskanie Wiedzy}.

Effect: Inspire Courage (Love Siktempora.name: Efekt: Inspire Courage (Love Siktempora)
Effect: Inspire Courage (Love Siktempora.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Inspire Defense (Love Siktempora.name: Efekt: Inspire Defense (Love Siktempora)
Effect: Inspire Defense (Love Siktempora.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance 4 to physical damage.

Effect: Inspire Envoy.name: Efekt: Inspire Envoy
Effect: Inspire Envoy.description: The creature gains a status bonus to attack rolls, AC, or all of the following: Perception, Will saves, and Charisma-based skill checks. The value of the bonus depends on the specific creature granting this effect.

Effect: Inspired Feast.name: Efekt: Inspired Feast
Effect: Inspired Feast.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Inspired Recitation.name: Efekt: Inspired Recitation
Effect: Inspired Recitation.description: All allies within 60 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws and 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Effect: Inspiring Aura.name: Efekt: Inspiring Aura
Effect: Inspiring Aura.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to initiative rolls and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Inspiring Display.name: Efekt: Inspiring Display
Effect: Inspiring Display.description: That target gains 4 temporary Hit Points that last until the start of the cavern mage's next turn.

Effect: Inspiring Presence.name: Efekt: Inspiring Presence
Effect: Inspiring Presence.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against fear effects.

Effect: Inspiring Presence (Empyreal Dra.name: Efekt: Inspiring Presence (Empyreal Dragon)
Effect: Inspiring Presence (Empyreal Dra.description: Creatures within the aura gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws and skill checks.

Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.name: Efekt: Instynktowne Majsterkowanie (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Interest is Due!.name: Efekt: Interest is Due!
Effect: Interest is Due!.description: Your Strike deals an an additional 1k6 mental damage.

Effect: Interpose.name: Efekt: Interpose
Effect: Interpose.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Invigorating Passion.name: Efekt: Invigorating Passion
Effect: Invigorating Passion.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and 10 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Invoke Rune.name: Efekt: Invoke Rune
Effect: Invoke Rune.description: A glowing copy of the invoked rune appears on a single weapon the giant holds, granting the weapon one effect of the giant's choice.

Effect: Iron Command (Extra Damage).name: Efekt: Iron Command (Extra Damage)
Effect: Iron Command (Extra Damage).description: Seldeg's Strikes against the triggering creature deal an additional 3 damage until the end of his next turn. Seldeg chooses whether the additional damage is spirit or void each time he uses this reaction.

Effect: Ironblood Stance.name: Efekt: Ironblood Stance
Effect: Ironblood Stance.description: Nakasha enters a stance of impenetrable iron. As long as she's in this stance, Nakasha can make iron sweep Strikes with her fists and gains resistance 2 to all damage.

Effect: Keep Up With Me!.name: Efekt: Keep Up With Me!
Effect: Keep Up With Me!.description: You gain a +3 status bonus to their attack roll on the next Strike you make, or to the DC of your next offensive ability if you're a troop.

Effect: Keeper's Ward.name: Efekt: Keeper's Ward
Effect: Keeper's Ward.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against magical effects. The bonus increases to +2 if the effect originated from an aquatic creature.

Effect: Kingpin's Presence.name: Efekt: Kingpin's Presence
Effect: Kingpin's Presence.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Lantern of Hope.name: Efekt: Lantern of Hope
Effect: Lantern of Hope.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Fala Rozpaczy}.

1.label: Lantern of Hope (vs Wave of Despair)

Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).name: Efekt: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)
Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).description: The creature gains a +3 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Fala Rozpaczy}.

Effect: Lawbringer.name: Efekt: Lawbringer
Effect: Lawbringer.description: The shieldmarshal marks a foe for judgment.

Effect: Leader's Command.name: Efekt: Leader's Command
Effect: Leader's Command.description: The creatures gains the leader's choice of a +2 status bonus to attack rolls or a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

Effect: Liberating Step.name: Efekt: Liberating Step
Effect: Liberating Step.description: You gain resistance 10 to all damage against the triggering damage.

Effect: Light of Truth.name: Efekt: Light of Truth
Effect: Light of Truth.description: Against creatures affected by this light, the zoaem and their allies gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and Recall Knowledge checks.

Effect: Lightning Powered.name: Efekt: Lightning Powered
Effect: Lightning Powered.description: For each shock zombie within 30 feet, the shock zombie gains fast healing 2 (to a maximum of fast healing 10).

Effect: Living Shield.name: Efekt: Living Shield
Effect: Living Shield.description: The rekhep grants an adjacent ally a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until they're no longer adjacent or until the start of the archon's next turn, whichever comes first.

Effect: Lost Plates.name: Efekt: Lost Plates
Effect: Lost Plates.description: The creature takes a status penalty to AC equal to the number of lost plates.

Effect: Lost Red Cap.name: Efekt: Lost Red Cap
Effect: Lost Red Cap.description: The creature takes a –4 status penalty to its damage rolls.

Effect: Lunar Blaze.name: Efekt: Lunar Blaze
Effect: Lunar Blaze.description: Diskah becomes immune to fire damage and her melee Strikes deal an additional 1k6 persistent fire damage.

Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Blask Czyhającego (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).description: Istota roztacza jasne światło w emanacji 20 stóp przez czas trwania efektu.

Effect: Magnificent…!.name: Efekt: Magnificent…!
Effect: Magnificent…!.description:
You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against the marked creature.

The scholar deals an extra 3k6 precision damage with their weapon and unarmed Strikes that hit that creature.

Effect: Mammoth Land Star Limbs.name: Efekt: Mammoth Land Star Limbs
Effect: Mammoth Land Star Limbs.description: The number of limbs the mammoth land star currently has.

Effect: Mangling Rend.name: Efekt: Mangling Rend
Effect: Mangling Rend.description: The target takes a –20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).name: Efekt: Manipulate Luck (Bad)
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).description: The creature must roll twice and use the lower result on its next k20 roll.

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).name: Efekt: Manipulate Luck (Good)
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).description: The affected creature can roll twice on one k20 roll within the next minute and use the higher result.

Effect: Manipulate Luck - Drusilla (Good.name: Efekt: Manipulate Luck - Drusilla (Good)
Effect: Manipulate Luck - Drusilla (Good.description: The affected creature can roll twice on one k20 roll within the next day and use the higher result.

Effect: Mark of Fate.name: Efekt: Mark of Fate
Effect: Mark of Fate.description: You gain weakness 10 to unholy and take a –2 circumstance penalty to Charisma-based skill checks against followers of Urgathoa.

Effect: Medical Malpractice.name: Efekt: Medical Malpractice
Effect: Medical Malpractice.description: The surgeon's melee Strikes deal extra precision damage against the marked creature.

Effect: Metallify.name: Efekt: Metallify
Effect: Metallify.description: The ooze gains resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine), it has a –5-foot penalty to its Speed, and its pseudopod Strikes gain the versatile S or P weapon trait.

Effect: Monologue.name: Efekt: Monologue
Effect: Monologue.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with their spells. Each time they take this action again, the bonuses increase by 1 and 2 respectively.

Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: Efekt: Moon Frenzy
Effect: Moon Frenzy.description: The creature becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2.

Effect: Mortal Reflection.name: Efekt: Mortal Reflection
Effect: Mortal Reflection.description: The imperfect automaton draws upon the target's emotions to recall a semblance of mortal feeling, gaining a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Motivating Assault.name: Efekt: Motivating Assault
Effect: Motivating Assault.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Musk.name: Efekt: Musk
Effect: Musk.description: The creature takes a –2 penalty to Stealth checks.

Effect: Mutilating Bite.name: Efekt: Mutilating Bite
Effect: Mutilating Bite.description: The creature then takes a –1 status penalty to Charisma-based checks. This penalty is cumulative up to –3.

Effect: My Turn!.name: Efekt: My Turn!
Effect: My Turn!.description: Kar gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Glow).name: Efekt: Nanite Surge (Glow)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Glow).description: The creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot emanation.

Effect: Natural Disguise.name: Efekt: Natural Disguise
Effect: Natural Disguise.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while in a natural environment until your next daily preparations or until its disguise is ruined, whichever comes first.

Effect: Near-Death Experience.name: Efekt: Near-Death Experience
Effect: Near-Death Experience.description: You reduce the DC of your recovery checks by 2.

Effect: Necrotic Field.name: Efekt: Necrotic Field
Effect: Necrotic Field.description: Undead within the aura deal an additional @Damage[1d6[void]] damage with their natural attacks.

Effect: Never off the Hook.name: Efekt: Never off the Hook
Effect: Never off the Hook.description: You take a –3 circumstance penalty to your Will DC against the origin's attempts to Demoralize or Coerce you.

Effect: No Fight Fair.name: Efekt: No Fight Fair
Effect: No Fight Fair.description: You take a status penalty to your speed.

Effect: No Quarter!.name: Efekt: No Quarter!
Effect: No Quarter!.description: The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.

Effect: Noxious Exhalation.name: Efekt: Noxious Exhalation
Effect: Noxious Exhalation.description: The creature gains weakness to mental 10 and a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.name: Efekt: Nymph Queen's Inspiration
Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.description:
The creature gains a +1 status bonus to all Crafting checks, Performance checks, and Will saves.

Bards receive additional benefits:

  • Enigma Muse: +1 status bonus to all Lore checks (not included)
  • Maestro Muse: +2 status bonus to Performance checks for the purpose of determining the effects of compositions
  • Polymath Muse: +4 status bonus to untrained skill checks
  • Other Muses: +2 status bonus to Will saves against fey

Effect: Oceanic Armor.name: Efekt: Oceanic Armor
Effect: Oceanic Armor.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: On Guard.name: Efekt: On Guard
Effect: On Guard.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Overdrive Engine.name: Efekt: Overdrive Engine
Effect: Overdrive Engine.description: Reginald gains 200 temporary Hit Points, a +15-foot status bonus to Speed, and a +2 status bonus to melee attack rolls.

Effect: PFS Level Bump (NPC).name: Efekt: PFS Level Bump (NPC)
Effect: PFS Level Bump (NPC).description:
Scenarios and quests are designed to challenge PCs whose average level is the lower of the two levels in a given Level Range (i.e., Level Range 1–2 is built to challenge 1. poziomu. PCs, and Level Range 3–4 is built to challenge 3. poziomu. PCs). Normally, when the Challenge Point total determines that the group's overall power is equivalent to the higher level in a Level Range (e.g. 2. level in Level Range 1–2), the scenario's scaling will adjust for this.

However, sometimes it is necessary to add a level bump, such as when the scenario's scaling is based on the number of players, or if the scenario lacks a low tier 16-18 scaling.

  • Increase the attack modifiers, attack damage, spell damage, saving throw modifiers, skill modifiers, Perception modifiers, and ACs by 1.
  • Increase the Hit Point total by 10 or by 10%, whichever is higher.

Effect: Pain Frenzy.name: Efekt: Pain Frenzy
Effect: Pain Frenzy.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Paired Spikes.name: Efekt: Paired Spikes
Effect: Paired Spikes.description: The creature gains weakness 15 to electricity damage.

Effect: Parry Dance.name: Efekt: Parry Dance
Effect: Parry Dance.description: The rake gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of their next turn.

Effect: Partial Armor.name: Efekt: Partial Armor
Effect: Partial Armor.description:
Ephemeral effect

Strikes made with ranged or reach weapons gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against Marguk.

Effect: Perfect Formation.name: Efekt: Perfect Formation
Effect: Perfect Formation.description: The troop gains a +2 item bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Pest Haven.name: Efekt: Pest Haven
Effect: Pest Haven.description: Any animal swarm sharing a space with a skinstitch gains fast healing 3.

Effect: Phalanx Fighter.name: Efekt: Phalanx Fighter
Effect: Phalanx Fighter.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Phantasmagoric Fog.name: Efekt: Phantasmagoric Fog
Effect: Phantasmagoric Fog.description: The hall fills with violet fog that imposes a –2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to all creatures within it and exposes anyone who enters it to phantasmagoric fog.

Effect: Phytohydra Heads.name: Efekt: Phytohydra Heads
Effect: Phytohydra Heads.description: The number of heads the hydra currently has.

Effect: Pilgrim's Ward.name: Efekt: Pilgrim's Ward
Effect: Pilgrim's Ward.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to all Religion checks and Will saves.

Effect: Pinpoint Weakness.name: Efekt: Pinpoint Weakness
Effect: Pinpoint Weakness.description: Tsimaan points out a weakness of a creature within 30 feet. Tsimaan and all allies that can see and hear her gain a +1 status bonus to their attack and damage rolls against that creature until the beginning of her next turn.

Effect: Poison Frenzy.name: Efekt: Poison Frenzy
Effect: Poison Frenzy.description: The poison eater flies into a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. While in a frenzy, the poison eater gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with melee Strikes, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with melee Strikes, gains 20 temporary Hit Points until the end of the frenzy, and takes a –2 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Posse's Edge.name: Efekt: Posse's Edge
Effect: Posse's Edge.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on initiative rolls.

Effect: Powder Burst.name: Efekt: Powder Burst
Effect: Powder Burst.description: -2 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Praise Adachros.name: Efekt: Praise Adachros
Effect: Praise Adachros.description: The creature gains +1 status bonus to attack rolls, perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Pray to the Rotting God.name: Efekt: Pray to the Rotting God
Effect: Pray to the Rotting God.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on attack rolls.

Effect: Prepare Fangs.name: Efekt: Prepare Fangs
Effect: Prepare Fangs.description: Daggers deals additional poison damage equal to the counter value.

Effect: Primal Sink.name: Efekt: Primal Sink
Effect: Primal Sink.description: Creatures with the animal trait gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws. If the animals have the swarm trait, the saving throw DCs to resist their damaging actions gain a +1 status bonus. This bonus increases to +2 for allies whose level is 2 or lower.

Effect: Profane Gift.name: Efekt: Profane Gift
Effect: Profane Gift.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws.

Effect: Protean Anatomy.name: Efekt: Protean Anatomy
Effect: Protean Anatomy.description: The creature gains resistance to either acid, electricity, or sonic according to its Protean Anatomy.

Effect: Pulse of Rage.name: Efekt: Pulse of Rage
Effect: Pulse of Rage.description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Putrid Blast.name: Efekt: Putrid Blast
Effect: Putrid Blast.description: Creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against xulgath bile for 1 minute.

Effect: Putrid Stench.name: Efekt: Putrid Stench
Effect: Putrid Stench.description: The creature takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Queen's Presence.name: Efekt: Queen's Presence
Effect: Queen's Presence.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Effect: Raise Defenses.name: Efekt: Raise Defenses
Effect: Raise Defenses.description: Each undead that shares the officer's splintered soul gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Raise Guard.name: Efekt: Raise Guard
Effect: Raise Guard.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Rally.name: Efekt: Rally
Effect: Rally.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws.

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.name: Efekt: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.description: The creature gains energy damage resistance similar to the triggering type.

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.name: Efekt: Rapid Evolution - Husk
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.description: The creature gains physical damage resistance similar to the triggering type.

Effect: Ravenous Young.name: Efekt: Ravenous Young
Effect: Ravenous Young.description: Once a larva is attached, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}. While the larva remains attached, the target cannot recover from persistent bleed.

Effect: Read the Cards.name: Efekt: Read the Cards
Effect: Read the Cards.description:
Roll 1k6 to determine a suit. The harrowkin gains the effects of the suit for 1 minute. If the suit matches the harrowkin's suit, the value is doubled.

Hammers The harrowkin gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Keys The harrowkin gains a +1 status bonus to AC.

Shields The harrowkin gains fast healing 5.

Books The harrowkin gains a +1 status bonus to skill checks.

Stars The harrowkin gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws.

Crown The harrowkin can reroll 1 check within the next minute and take the higher result. This is a fortune effect.

Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.name: Efekt: Czytanie z Gwiazd (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.description: Istota zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do rzutów obronnych.

Effect: Regression.name: Efekt: Regression
Effect: Regression.description: The creature shrinks one size and all of the target's proficiencies of expert and better are reduced to trained.

Effect: Reminder of Doom.name: Efekt: Reminder of Doom
Effect: Reminder of Doom.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Remove Face.name: Efekt: Remove Face
Effect: Remove Face.description: The creature takes a permanent –4 status penalty to Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks. This penalty can be removed only if the victim recovers its face and has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Przywrócenie} spell cast on it.

Effect: Replenishment of War (Endlo).name: Efekt: Replenishment of War (Endlo)
Effect: Replenishment of War (Endlo).description: When Endlo damages a creature with a greatsword Strike, he gains 6 temporary Hit Points until the start of his next turn. If the Strike was a critical hit, he instead gains 12 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Resonance.name: Efekt: Resonance
Effect: Resonance.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for effects with the selected trait; a creature with the elemental and selected traits gains this bonus to all attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Revert Form.name: Efekt: Revert Form
Effect: Revert Form.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Riding Zogototaru.name: Efekt: Riding Zogototaru
Effect: Riding Zogototaru.description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty to your Reflex saves against Zogototaru's Thrashing.

Effect: Roast.name: Efekt: Roast
Effect: Roast.description: Creatures who have been Roasted take a –2 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against Serve.

Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.name: Efekt: Rockfall Critical Failure
Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.description: The affected creature takes a –20-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 2 rounds.

Effect: Rockfall Failure.name: Efekt: Rockfall Failure
Effect: Rockfall Failure.description: The affected creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Root in Place.name: Efekt: Root in Place
Effect: Root in Place.description: Your Speed is reduced to 0 and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and 2 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Rope Snare.name: Efekt: Rope Snare
Effect: Rope Snare.description: The creature takes a 10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.

Effect: Rotting Stench.name: Efekt: Rotting Stench
Effect: Rotting Stench.description: While within the aura, creatures also take a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against fear and to recover from the sickened condition.

1.text: While within the aura, creatures take a –2 circumstance penalty to recover from the sickened condition.

Effect: Runic Resistance.name: Efekt: Runic Resistance
Effect: Runic Resistance.description: The creature gains resistance 5 to one damage type.

Effect: Sacrifice Armor.name: Efekt: Sacrifice Armor
Effect: Sacrifice Armor.description: The scrapborn's AC is lowered for 24 hours. The scrapborn's AC cannot be reduced below 16 in this way.

Effect: Sage's Analysis.name: Efekt: Sage's Analysis
Effect: Sage's Analysis.description: The sage gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and AC against the marked creature and deals an additional 2k6 damage to the creature with weapon attacks.

Effect: Sandstorm.name: Efekt: Sandstorm
Effect: Sandstorm.description: The creature takes a –4 circumstance penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Sanguine Rain.name: Efekt: Sanguine Rain
Effect: Sanguine Rain.description: A creature that benefits from consuming blood (such as bloodseekers or vampires) gains fast healing 10 while in the area.

Effect: Scent of Blood.name: Efekt: Scent of Blood
Effect: Scent of Blood.description: You 10 temporary HP and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with your unarmed attacks, but become off-guard.

Effect: Scraping Clamor.name: Efekt: Scraping Clamor
Effect: Scraping Clamor.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to any saves to resist auditory spells or abilities.

Effect: Sea Chantey.name: Efekt: Sea Chantey
Effect: Sea Chantey.description: All fiends within 60 feet gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Effect: Sepulchral Drain.name: Efekt: Sepulchral Drain
Effect: Sepulchral Drain.description: The creature gains weakness 2 to void damage.

Effect: Serpent Mode.name: Efekt: Serpent Mode
Effect: Serpent Mode.description:
The clockwork serpent transforms into a different mode. Roll 1k3 and consult the options below.

1 Cobra Mode The clockwork serpent can use Intimidating Hood.

2 Constrictor Mode The clockwork serpent can use its coils Strike and can Constrict.

3 Rattlesnake Mode The clockwork serpent can use Shattering Rattle.

Effect: Shackling Cold.name: Efekt: Shackling Cold
Effect: Shackling Cold.description: You take a –10 circumstance penalty to your Speed.

Effect: Shadow Rapier.name: Efekt: Shadow Rapier
Effect: Shadow Rapier.description: The rake shrouds their sword in void energy, changing the damage type to void.

Effect: Share Pain.name: Efekt: Share Pain
Effect: Share Pain.description: The creature takes a status penalty to its Speeds based on its save result.

Effect: Shields Up!.name: Efekt: Shields Up!
Effect: Shields Up!.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves.

Effect: Sic 'Em!.name: Efekt: Sic 'Em!
Effect: Sic 'Em!.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Sight Prey.name: Efekt: Sight Prey
Effect: Sight Prey.description: The warmonger's ranged Strikes against the marked creature gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and deal an extra 3k6 precision damage. Each time the warmonger hits that creature with a ranged Strike, the creature takes a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute and falls 20 feet if it's flying.

Effect: Sight Prey (Speed Penalty).name: Efekt: Sight Prey (Speed Penalty)
Effect: Sight Prey (Speed Penalty).description: You take a penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Silent Aura.name: Efekt: Silent Aura
Effect: Silent Aura.description: A silent stalker makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing them using hearing or a similar sense alone. This silence stops all sound within it or passing through. The silent stalker and all creatures in the aura can't use sonic attacks or actions that have the auditory trait; this prevents creatures from casting spells with verbal components or activating items with command components.

Effect: Sinful Bite.name: Efekt: Sinful Bite
Effect: Sinful Bite.description: You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Sixfold Flurry.name: Efekt: Sixfold Flurry
Effect: Sixfold Flurry.description: The creature gains a circumstance bonus to AC based on the Strikes it chose not to take.

Effect: Skin Net.name: Efekt: Skin Net
Effect: Skin Net.description: You take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Slime Trap.name: Efekt: Slime Trap
Effect: Slime Trap.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Slithering Vine.name: Efekt: Slithering Vine
Effect: Slithering Vine.description: The stelemora increases the reach of their vine Strike by 10 feet until the end of their turn.

Effect: Smash Kneecaps.name: Efekt: Smash Kneecaps
Effect: Smash Kneecaps.description: The creature's Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Effect: Snake Form.name: Efekt: Snake Form
Effect: Snake Form.description: The bunyip's tail Strike gains reach 10 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab}, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.

Effect: Solidarity.name: Efekt: Solidarity
Effect: Solidarity.description: While leading a demonstration, the union organizer grants themself and their allies a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fatigue and mental effects.

Effect: Song of Freedom.name: Efekt: Song of Freedom
Effect: Song of Freedom.description: The troop's Will saves increase to +29 against all mental effects.

Effect: Song of the Skies.name: Efekt: Song of the Skies
Effect: Song of the Skies.description: You gain a fly speed of 60 ft.

Effect: Song of the Swamp.name: Efekt: Song of the Swamp
