Effect: Song of the Swamp.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls and saves against fear.

Effect: Soul Crush (Healing).name: Efekt: Soul Crush (Healing)
Effect: Soul Crush (Healing).description: The thanadaemon gains fast healing 15 for 1 minute.

Effect: Soul Lock (Healing).name: Efekt: Soul Lock (Healing)
Effect: Soul Lock (Healing).description: The cacodaemon gains fast healing 5 for 1 minute.

Effect: Soul Siphon.name: Efekt: Soul Siphon
Effect: Soul Siphon.description: The creature gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Spear Parry.name: Efekt: Spear Parry
Effect: Spear Parry.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Spill Secrets.name: Efekt: Spill Secrets
Effect: Spill Secrets.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the marked creature.

Effect: Spiritual Warden.name: Efekt: Spiritual Warden
Effect: Spiritual Warden.description: Allies in the aura gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects and effects that target or manipulate their souls.

Effect: Splintered Ground.name: Efekt: Splintered Ground
Effect: Splintered Ground.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.name: Efekt: Splintered Ground (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.description: The creature takes a –15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Spotlight.name: Efekt: Spotlight
Effect: Spotlight.description: The target gains a +2 status bonus to Performance checks and resistance 10 to mental damage.

Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.name: Efekt: Spray Toxic Oil
Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 5, and whenever the creature critically fails wth an attack roll with a wielded weapon, it drops the weapon.

Effect: Stab it! Stab it! Stab it!.name: Efekt: Stab it! Stab it! Stab it!
Effect: Stab it! Stab it! Stab it!.description: Your attacks against the marked target deal 1 additional damage dice.

Effect: Stay Strong!.name: Efekt: Stay Strong!
Effect: Stay Strong!.description: The allied animal gains a +1 circumstance bonus to the save.

Effect: Stench.name: Efekt: Stench
Effect: Stench.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony} condition.

Effect: Steward of the Faithful.name: Efekt: Steward of the Faithful
Effect: Steward of the Faithful.description: Each ally in the aura who worships Pharasma gains resistance 5 to void and a +1 status bonus to Will saves, Diplomacy checks, and Medicine checks.

Effect: Stick a Fork in It.name: Efekt: Stick a Fork in It
Effect: Stick a Fork in It.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Sticky Spores.name: Efekt: Sticky Spores
Effect: Sticky Spores.description: The creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.

Effect: Still Got It!.name: Efekt: Still Got It!
Effect: Still Got It!.description: The retired creature gains temporary Hit Points equal to its level that last until the end of the encounter. The retired creature also suppresses the effects of being rusty until the end of the encounter.

Effect: Stink Sap.name: Efekt: Stink Sap
Effect: Stink Sap.description: Creatures and their equipment coated in the sap smell horrible. Creatures in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:16] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}, and on a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is immune to stink sap for 1 minute. Creatures don't save against this effect in exploration mode and don't become temporarily immune, but creatures with stink sap on them must roll against their own aura when they roll initiative in encounter mode. The sap dissipates after 10 hours; spending 10 minutes scrubbing the sap off with soap and water reduces the duration by 1 hour.

Effect: Stoke the Fervent.name: Efekt: Stoke the Fervent
Effect: Stoke the Fervent.description:
Each ally that hears the call gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws, and takes a –1 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able (even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

The effect duration has been set to the average duration of [[/gmr 2d4 #rounds]]{2k4 rounds}. Set the duration to the correct value when the effect is added.

Effect: Stoke the Fervent (High Tormento.name: Efekt: Stoke the Fervent (High Tormentor)
Effect: Stoke the Fervent (High Tormento.description:
Each ally that hears the call gains a +4 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls, a +2 status bonus to saving throws, and takes a –2 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able (even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

The effect duration has been set to the average duration of [[/gmr 2d4 #rounds]]{2k4 rounds}. Set the duration to the correct value when the effect is added.

Effect: Super Qi Blast.name: Efekt: Super Qi Blast
Effect: Super Qi Blast.description: The grandmaster's body expands as it prepares to exude an unfathomable amount of qi. If the grandmaster's next action is to cast the two-action version of qi blast, the size of the cone increases to 120 feet and the damage increases to 16k6. The grandmaster also becomes one size category larger for the next minute, dealing an additional +9 damage with their melee Strikes. Additionally, the grandmaster is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}. This drained condition is cumulative.

Effect: Surge Forward.name: Efekt: Surge Forward
Effect: Surge Forward.description: You take a –1 circumstance penalty to your next skill check to overcome a task during the Dreaded Downpour event. On a critical failure this penalty is –2.

Effect: Surgical Rend.name: Efekt: Surgical Rend
Effect: Surgical Rend.description: Until the creature is restored to its maximum Hit Points, thus closing the wound, Strikes against the creature deal 1k6 extra precision damage.

Effect: Susceptible to Mockery (Critical.name: Efekt: Susceptible to Mockery (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Susceptible to Mockery (Critical.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Strikes and damage rolls against foes.

Effect: Swarming Bites.name: Efekt: Swarming Bites
Effect: Swarming Bites.description: A creature that fails its save against Swarming Bites becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for 1 round. If the creature attempts a concentrate or manipulate action while affected, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.

0.text: If the creature attempts a concentrate or manipulate action while affected, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.

If the creature attempts a concentrate or manipulate action while affected, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.

Effect: Swell.name: Efekt: Swell
Effect: Swell.description: The creature grows to Huge size, and its reach increases to 15 feet. It also gains 12 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to bludgeoning, and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls

Effect: Swig.name: Efekt: Swig
Effect: Swig.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to melee damage rolls and saving throws against fear but are off-guard.

Effect: Swig (Clumsy).name: Efekt: Swig (Clumsy)
Effect: Swig (Clumsy).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to melee damage rolls and saving throws against fear but are clumsy 1.

Effect: Sylvan Wine.name: Efekt: Sylvan Wine
Effect: Sylvan Wine.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter).name: Efekt: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter)
Effect: Sylvan Wine (Horned Hunter).description: The creature gains a +3 item bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Symbol of Loyalty.name: Efekt: Symbol of Loyalty
Effect: Symbol of Loyalty.description: Allies in the aura who are 14th level and lower and are loyal to the grand inquisitor's cause get a +3 status bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Tactical Command.name: Efekt: Tactical Command
Effect: Tactical Command.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to their Strike if the veteran noble has dealt with that creature or an organization that creature belongs to before, as the veteran offers hard-earned tactical advice.

Effect: Take Them Down!.name: Efekt: Take Them Down!
Effect: Take Them Down!.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Technology Control.name: Efekt: Technology Control
Effect: Technology Control.description:
The target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its attack rolls and DCs against a creature it would not normally attack.

Note: This effect applies a penalty to all rolls and DCs while active.

Effect: Temper Armament.name: Efekt: Temper Armament
Effect: Temper Armament.description: Tempering armor or a shield increases its Hardness by 1. Tempering a weapon grants the weapon a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Tenacious Flames.name: Efekt: Tenacious Flames
Effect: Tenacious Flames.description: Creatures in the emanation cannot recover from persistent fire damage.

Effect: Timely Advice.name: Efekt: Timely Advice
Effect: Timely Advice.description: The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Tooth Tug.name: Efekt: Tooth Tug
Effect: Tooth Tug.description: You take a –1 status penalty to Charisma-based skill checks and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to Cast a Spell unless that spell has the subtle trait.

Effect: Totems of the Past.name: Efekt: Totems of the Past
Effect: Totems of the Past.description: Any lizardfolk allies in the area are inspired, gaining a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Toxic Effluvium.name: Efekt: Toxic Effluvium
Effect: Toxic Effluvium.description: Kanker's melee Strikes deal an additional 2k6 poison damage.

Effect: Transfer Protection.name: Efekt: Transfer Protection
Effect: Transfer Protection.description: A creature can wear a willing cassisian as a helmet. While it does, the cassisian can't act, but the cassisian extends their +1 status bonus to AC and saves against unholy creatures to their wearer. At any time, the cassisian can detach themself from their wearer as a single action.

Effect: Uncanny Tinker.name: Efekt: Nienaturalne Majsterkowanie
Effect: Uncanny Tinker.description: Istota zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do rzutów ataku.

Effect: Undead Mastery.name: Efekt: Undead Mastery
Effect: Undead Mastery.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

Effect: Under Command.name: Efekt: Under Command
Effect: Under Command.description: Commanded by a captain of the guard.

Effect: Unluck Aura.name: Efekt: Unluck Aura
Effect: Unluck Aura.description: The creature must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.

Effect: Unsettled Aura.name: Efekt: Unsettled Aura
Effect: Unsettled Aura.description: Gosregs project a field of discordant energy that unsettles the minds of thinking creatures. Any non-mindless creature within 30 feet of a gosreg takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Unsettling Attention.name: Efekt: Unsettling Attention
Effect: Unsettling Attention.description: Porażka The creature becomes unsettled and suffers a –2 penalty to all saves against fear effects as long as they remain within the hex containing Candlemere.

Effect: Utter Despair.name: Efekt: Utter Despair
Effect: Utter Despair.description: Living creatures are frightened 2 while in an utter despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but lose the frightened condition immediately upon leaving the area.

Effect: Vamollaroth Stench.name: Efekt: Vamollaroth Stench
Effect: Vamollaroth Stench.description: The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against poison and to recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony} condition.

Effect: Vengeful Fibers.name: Efekt: Vengeful Fibers
Effect: Vengeful Fibers.description: The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed

Effect: Vent Energy.name: Efekt: Vent Energy
Effect: Vent Energy.description: The hadrinnex's weapon arm strikes deal an extra 2k6 energy damage according to the damage type in the energy gland.

Effect: Verdant Aria.name: Efekt: Verdant Aria
Effect: Verdant Aria.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Vicious Bluster.name: Efekt: Vicious Bluster
Effect: Vicious Bluster.description: When a gargarthezul successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizes} a foe, it gains 1k6 temporary Hit Points (2k6 on a critical success) that last for 1 minute.

Effect: Vicious Bluster (Critical Succes.name: Efekt: Vicious Bluster (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Vicious Bluster (Critical Succes.description: When a gargarthezul successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizes} a foe, it gains 1k6 temporary Hit Points (2k6 on a critical success) that last for 1 minute.

Effect: Viscous Breath.name: Efekt: Viscous Breath
Effect: Viscous Breath.description: Creatures in the aura take a –2 status penalty to any non-magical physical attacks they attempt.

Effect: Viscous Trap.name: Efekt: Viscous Trap
Effect: Viscous Trap.description: The creature takes a –15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Void Shroud.name: Efekt: Void Shroud
Effect: Void Shroud.description: Living creatures in the emanation take a –2 status penalty to saves against fear and death effects.

Effect: Void Tendrils.name: Efekt: Void Tendrils
Effect: Void Tendrils.description: When you would be healed by a vitality effect, the healing is reduced by 15.

Effect: Volcanic Purge.name: Efekt: Volcanic Purge
Effect: Volcanic Purge.description: The target takes @Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]] damage, and as long as it has this persistent fire damage, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Vomit Tar.name: Efekt: Vomit Tar
Effect: Vomit Tar.description: The creature is slowed 1 and gains fire weakness 5.

Effect: Vulnerable to Curved Space.name: Efekt: Vulnerable to Curved Space
Effect: Vulnerable to Curved Space.description: When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90º (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes sickened 1.

Effect: Wallow.name: Efekt: Wallow
Effect: Wallow.description: The war pig gains temporary hit points.

Effect: War Cry.name: Efekt: War Cry
Effect: War Cry.description: You gain an additional 1k6 damage with its Strikes.

Effect: War Leader.name: Efekt: War Leader
Effect: War Leader.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Warded Casting.name: Efekt: Warded Casting
Effect: Warded Casting.description: Emaliza gains 20 temporary Hit Points and resistance 20 to either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage.

Effect: Warning Hoot.name: Efekt: Warning Hoot
Effect: Warning Hoot.description: Targets gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative roll.

Effect: Waterlogged.name: Efekt: Waterlogged
Effect: Waterlogged.description: While waterlogged, the berberoka can use Spray Water, their size grows to Gargantuan, and their Speed is reduced to 15 feet.

Effect: Whirlwind Form.name: Efekt: Whirlwind Form
Effect: Whirlwind Form.description: The creature gains resistance 10 to physical damage.

Effect: Wild Shape (Oaksteward).name: Efekt: Wild Shape (Oaksteward)
Effect: Wild Shape (Oaksteward).description: The Oaksteward's hands transform into wild claws.

Effect: Will Not Falter.name: Efekt: Will Not Falter
Effect: Will Not Falter.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against fear.

Effect: Wolf Shape.name: Efekt: Wolf Shape
Effect: Wolf Shape.description: The barghest gains Speed 40 and its jaws gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

Effect: Words of Encouragement.name: Efekt: Words of Encouragement
Effect: Words of Encouragement.description: You ignore any circumstance and status penalties you have.

Effect: Wrath of Fate.name: Efekt: Wrath of Fate
Effect: Wrath of Fate.description: An affected creature can choose to roll twice when it attempts an attack, saving throw, or skill check and take the lower result. After this the effect ends.

Effect: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.name: Efekt: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality
Effect: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.description: The nyktera gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for their fist Strikes.

Effect: Xulgath Stench.name: Efekt: Xulgath Stench
Effect: Xulgath Stench.description: The creature takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Yobnobby Overdrive.name: Efekt: Yobnobby Overdrive
Effect: Yobnobby Overdrive.description: Yobnobby deals additional damage on her strikes.

Effect: You'll Pay for That.name: Efekt: You'll Pay for That
Effect: You'll Pay for That.description: You gain a +5 status bonus to your next damage roll against the marked enemy.

Effect: Zinba Restoration.name: Efekt: Zinba Restoration
Effect: Zinba Restoration.description: The creature gains fast healing 5 for 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem (Kanya).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Courageous Anthem (Kanya)
Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem (Kanya).description:
Zapewniany przez a Kanya's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Stance: Hunter's Precision.name: Postawa: Hunter's Precision
Stance: Hunter's Precision.description: Your Strikes deal an additional 2k8 precision damage, and the range increment for your ranged weapon Strikes is 20 feet longer than normal. On a critical hit, the target also takes 2k6 persistent bleed damage.
